text: Marie-Renée Oget (born 26 January 1945 in Rostrenen, Côtes-d'Armor) was a member of the National Assembly of France from 2002 to 2012.She represented the Côtes-d'Armor department (4th constituency), as a member of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche. She was member of the cultural, familial and social affairs committee. She is the mayor of Treffrin in the Côtes-d'Armor département. ==External Links== * Her page on the National Assembly site ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:People from Côtes-d'Armor Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Women mayors of places in France Category:20th-century French women politicians Category:Women members of the National Assembly (France) Category:Deputies of the 12th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:21st-century French women politicians
title: Marie-Renée Oget
